## IMultiInitialState interface

Optional initial state for [IMultiCallControl](./jabra-js.imulticallcontrol.md)<!-- -->.

Used to set the initial state if the device was changed in the middle of a call, or to recover the state after device disconnections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IMultiInitialState 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [muted?](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.muted.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> <code>true</code> to mute the device and <code>false</code> to unmute. |
|  [ongoingCalls](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.ongoingcalls.md) |  | number | Determines the number of ongoing calls at the time of initialization. When set to <code>0</code>, no ongoing calls are happening. |
|  [onHold?](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.onhold.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> <code>true</code> to hold the device and <code>false</code> to not hold the device. |
